content.rendered:
Excess Baggage Allowance:

Services between Guernsey and the UK and Grenoble £12.00 per kg. All other services £4 per Kg.

For more details visit : http://www.aurignyaairlines.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Aurigny Airlines Hand | Cabin Baggage

Aurigny Airlines Checked Baggage
